text: Very nice, empathetic female doctor. She helped me and my mother with dermatological problems. We are very grateful for the help.
The female doctor is above all very warm, and as we know that's an invaluable quality for patients.
Very nice and empathetic doctor. She made a diagnosis right away and referred me for further treatment. I recommend
In my opinion, the most important thing is the accuracy of the diagnosis, and thus the effectiveness of the treatment applied. In my case, it worked 100%.
I recommend, the female dermatologist is professional, to the point, and very polite.
I am very satisfied, the female doctor is direct and empathetic. The diagnosis was accurate, and the effects of the prescribed medication were visible the very next day.
Highly recommend. An effective and professional dermatological visit.
Matter-of-fact and empathetic, a wonderful doctor with knowledge and experience, I appreciate the commitment especially since we travel with our 15-month-old son who has atopic dermatitis.
A very competent doctor. Quick diagnosis and hopefully it will be effective.

The female doctor approached my problem very professionally, explained how to use the prescribed medication. The female doctor is a nice, pleasant, and matter-of-fact person. Thank you very much for the visit and I will definitely return. I warmly recommend.

Anna analyzed my past treatment, described in detail the problem I am struggling with, its possible causes, and presented the treatment and recommended tests precisely - also potential future paths. A very informative consultation. I recommend.

I do not recommend. The visit was delayed and extremely short (9 minutes is a record time for examining the skin), you could feel the female doctor's rush. The proposed treatment method did not bring any results, so 300 z≈Ç wasted ;)
The female doctor is very nice, she gave me clear answers to all my questions :)
The atmosphere during the visit was very matter-of-fact. I recommend the female doctor, she is pleasant and listens to the patient attentively.
The female doctor is very nice, approaches matters professionally, is 100% focused on the patient and their ailment. She explains everything thoroughly - what to do and how.
Anna is great. Approach to the little patient, she explained what and how :) super :) we wish you success on your further career path :) best regards!
I really recommend the female doctor! A very thorough interview and detailed explanation :)
Everything explained thoroughly, the visit took place in a pleasant atmosphere.
I am very satisfied, everything was explained well.
A reliable, pleasant, and committed specialist. Definitely worth recommending.
